sentences: Ma ei tea, mida rämps tähendab.
See on vana rämps, mis on juba aastaid kasutamata.
Tegelikult see polegi mingisugune rämps, vaid lihtsalt halva kvaliteediga ese.
context: The word 'rämps' is an Estonian noun that refers to junk, trash, rubbish, or clutter. It's often used to describe items that are old, useless, of poor quality, or just taking up space without purpose. The word carries a somewhat dismissive or derogatory connotation toward the items being described.
